description: Try our easy to follow Wholesome Blueberry Pancakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Wholesome Blueberry Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, whisk ricotta and extra milk until smooth. Serve pancakes topped with ricotta and remaining blueberries, and drizzled with honey.
